t: Amazon.com: U-Turn Audio: Orbit Plus Turntable
s: Get more out of your records with the Orbit Plus. Our acrylic platter doesn’t just sit there looking pretty - it provides improved speed stability and dissipates unwanted resonances. The result: more lifelike tonality and punchier bass. The Plus also features the Ortofon OM5E cartridge, which ...
U-Turn Audio is an independent American maker of high-quality turntables, speakers, and preamps for vinyl enthusiasts.
